groups:concept.deftn: the level of acceptance of a metadata record in a repository

outline.groups:deftn: the metadata record is accessible the catalog/library/repository
the metadata record is not accessible in the catalog/library/repository
the metadata record is temporarily inaccessible in the catalog/library/repository
the metadata record was edited by the collection builder and it is now again at the catalog/library/repository awaiting a decision about whether it will be accessioned
the metadata record is at the catalog/library/repository and is awaiting a decision about whether it will be accessioned
the metadata record does not have an official categorization and should be treated as a potential record
the metadata record exists but may be incomplete or new and the catalog/library/repository should treat it as a potential record
a cataloger of the collection is actively working with the metadata record
the metadata record is generally complete and operationally works in the catalog/library/repository but some information may still need editing or updating
